overview: Ten Minutes To Midnight asks the question: how do you meet other people? Like an invitation to rediscover Levinasâ€™ ideas, the film traces a path towards a face, the revelation of the infinite and the home of the whole of humanity.
tagline: Singing rap. Biting your nails. Eat a whole apple, with its seeds. The yellow pill. Your golden watch. And act for people. Ten minutes to midnight, and it will be the last time we see each other.
title: Ten Minutes To Midnight
